body:
Dear List,


I can't find the *gendaymtx* program when searching by "$ which gendaymtx".


Its man page is on Radiance site so I assume it's included in the Radiance
standard distribution I installed on Mac. Or should I download and install
it from somewhere else?


Advices are greatly appreciated!


- Ji
